name: Aria's Colorful Journey
description:
This game was created for the 8-bits to Infinity game jam, VimJam. The theme of the Jam is games with Collectables and the theme is There and Back.

The original idea for this game came from my daughter who presented me with a painting she'd done just a few days before the start of the jam. I decided that it would be the perfect start...

Aria is a little who discovers a strange creature outside her house who steals all the colour from her world. She decides to go on a journey to get them back!

The game is a platformer where the player has to collect colours to get out of each level.  At the end she finds something special and has to come back through the levels to get home and defeat the nasty Colour Vampires along the way.

Controls are Arrow Keys, Space to jump and Ctrl to fire (when you get rainbow power). It also supports an Xbox Controller. A = Jump, X = Fire.

Know Bugs:

There's a bug with the final boss battle where the player can't move (sorry!)
